summary: BTS as Boyfriends! || Text Imagine Series || You x Jungkook Vol. 1 || He won’t let you sleep … Feat. OT7  Just something simple...
caption:
BTS as Boyfriends! || Text Imagine Series || You x Jungkook Vol. 1 || He won’t let you sleep … Feat. OT7

Just something simple for the soul. Like a cup of hot chocolate ☕️ or a good old hug. 💖

FLUFF

More boyfriend texts:

Jimin | Vol. 1

Yoongi | Vol. 1

More to come.

Thank you for reading! 💗 Hope you liked it! ☺️

Take care and have a great day! 💖

Here you can find my Masterlist in case you feel like checking out more of my BTS fiction.

blog.name: artwork-mystery
blog.title: BTS
blog.description: | Info | Masterlist | Ao3 | Writer | BTS Enthusiast | Love Yourself |

summary: Masterlist © artwork-mystery — all rights reserved. reposting/modifying of any kind is not allowed. translations not allowed. ||...
body:
Masterlist

© artwork-mystery — all rights reserved. reposting/modifying of any kind is not allowed. translations not allowed.

|| Legend ||

♥ = Angst | ♡ = Fluff | ♧ = Humor/Crack

☆ = AU/Fantasy | ☠ = Thriller/Horror

* = Popular Fics | M = Mature

|| Series Legend ||

✎ = In Progress | ✐ = On Hold

✓ = Completed

OT7

|| One Shots ||

Drunktan Sonyeondan: ♡ | ♧

Who’s bright idea was it to have a drinking contest? Oh yeah, it was all of you because you’re all dumb crackheads enough as it is without even drinking, who have no control; hence why you’re all drunk off your asses, causing chaos and mischief all around you - being even dumber and louder than usual!

|| Series ||

None yet

Kim Seokjin

|| One Shots ||

Into The Deep: ♥ | ☆

It’s said when a broken-hearted human cries into the deep, dark waters of the ocean, they will be swept away from all of their sorrows. They say the ocean carries them away but you come to find out it wasn’t the water itself - it’s what was lurking within.

Llama Drama: ♧

Your friend Jin comes to you asking for help, and you really would have helped, but punishing him for his crazy antics is much more appealing - especially since he had woken you up at 5:30 in the morning!

Heart Event: ♡ | ♧

Receiving notes and gifts from a secret admirer during school is nice and makes for a far more interesting day, but the question is: who is behind it all? You’ll find out soon enough and you couldn’t be more ecstatic to learn the one and only Kim Seokjin has something to do with it.

|| Series ||

None yet

Min Yoongi

|| One Shots ||

The Cat’s Meow: ♡ | ♧ | ☆ | *

Note to self: Give lots of cuddles, love, and attention to Yoongi because he’s a very needy and soft kitty. Also do not tease him with horrible cat puns or he’ll just have to make you be quiet.

An Attempt Was Made: ♡ | ♧

What happens when two people (Yoongi and yourself) like each other but are painfully oblivious to each other’s attempts at flirting? Confusion and frustration arises! But when Yoongi has finally had enough of you not noticing his attempts - although he was non the wiser with your attempts - he confesses… in his own way but things work out!

As Sweet As Suga®: ♡ | ♧ | *

Your boyfriend is the sweetest thing to exist and you love him dearly - which is why you decide to give him a fitting nickname. He also loves you so he complies, but sometimes he really wonders what the hell goes on inside that head of yours.

|| Series ||

None yet

Jung Hoseok

|| One Shots ||

The Colors Of The Rainbow: ♡ | ♧ | ☆

Your best friend may not be able to see, but with your help he can see everything perfectly clear, and you are the clearest of all.

Goodbye My Love: ♧

There are two things Hoseok looks forward to having, but unfortunately for him he isn’t allowed, and he mourns his loss of eating a good hamburger with some sprite.

|| Series ||

None yet

Kim Namjoon

|| One Shots ||

Everything Goes: ♥

You showed him the wonderful side of life, making him hold onto every precious memory no matter how small. You also showed him the bad side but he accepted it. It wasn’t your fault - he didn’t want to let you go but everything must go eventually.

Caught On Camera: ♧

Catching ghosts on camera isn’t easy, and although he hasn’t captured anything on camera yet, he doesn’t give up. Weird things start happening one day and he thinks he’ll finally get something but what he finds is not what he expected.

Books and Deals: ♡ | ♧

Agreeing with the tall, cute stranger’s deal to share the only book you both happen to want, is the best decision you’ve ever made.

|| Series ||

None yet

Park Jimin

|| One Shots ||

Kiss It Better: ♡ | ♧

School is a drag and you go through your days all the same. But who knew a little bit of pain could bring happiness in the form of Park Jimin.

Puppy Love: ♡ | ☆ | *

Your hybrid, Jimin, hates baths but he certainly doesn’t hate it when you help him and give him lots of attention and cuddles. He loves it all - especially you.

|| Series ||

None yet

Kim Taehyung

|| One Shots ||

A Very UnMerry Christmas: ♡ | ♧

Your husband likes to cling onto his childhood and innocence but your daughter shatters it all. He isn’t truly upset, he knows the truth deep down, but he sure wishes your daughter wouldn’t grow up so fast. Good thing you got them a present that makes everything better.

Fairytale: ♡ | ☆

There are stories which tell of a mystical being who protects and heals the sacred forests and it’s creatures within; many don’t believe because that’s all they are - stories. But it’s all far too real when you become a part of the fairytale.

|| Series ||

None yet

Jeon Jungkook

|| One Shots ||

What I See: ♡ | *

Jungkook finds many things beautiful and likes to take pictures of them; one of his favorite subjects happens to be you, and he wants to capture every single moment, but you don’t think you’re as beautiful as the other things he snaps pictures of - he’ll just have to show you how beautiful you truly are.

|| Series ||

Lost and Found Masterlist: ♥ | ♡ | ☆ | * | ✎

Running away and getting lost in the mountainous forest was a mistake, but you meet a wolf that is like no other, who helps you and you instantly grow attached - maybe it wasn’t a mistake and it was actually fate.

Note to self: Give lots of cuddles, love, and attention to Yoongi because he’s a very needy and soft kitty. Also do not tease him with horrible cat puns or he’ll just have to make you be quiet.

An Attempt Was Made: ♡ | ♧

What happens when two people (Yoongi and yourself) like each other but are painfully oblivious to each other’s attempts at flirting? Confusion and frustration arises! But when Yoongi has finally had enough of you not noticing his attempts - although he was non the wiser with your attempts - he confesses… in his own way but things work out!

As Sweet As Suga®: ♡ | ♧ | *

Your boyfriend is the sweetest thing to exist and you love him dearly - which is why you decide to give him a fitting nickname. He also loves you so he complies, but sometimes he really wonders what the hell goes on inside that head of yours.

|| Series ||

None yet

Jung Hoseok

|| One Shots ||

The Colors Of The Rainbow: ♡ | ♧ | ☆

Your best friend may not be able to see, but with your help he can see everything perfectly clear, and you are the clearest of all.

Goodbye My Love: ♧

There are two things Hoseok looks forward to having, but unfortunately for him he isn’t allowed, and he mourns his loss of eating a good hamburger with some sprite.

|| Series ||

None yet

Kim Namjoon

|| One Shots ||

Everything Goes: ♥

You showed him the wonderful side of life, making him hold onto every precious memory no matter how small. You also showed him the bad side but he accepted it. It wasn’t your fault - he didn’t want to let you go but everything must go eventually.

Caught On Camera: ♧

Catching ghosts on camera isn’t easy, and although he hasn’t captured anything on camera yet, he doesn’t give up. Weird things start happening one day and he thinks he’ll finally get something but what he finds is not what he expected.

Books and Deals: ♡ | ♧

Agreeing with the tall, cute stranger’s deal to share the only book you both happen to want, is the best decision you’ve ever made.

|| Series ||

None yet

Park Jimin

|| One Shots ||

Kiss It Better: ♡ | ♧

School is a drag and you go through your days all the same. But who knew a little bit of pain could bring happiness in the form of Park Jimin.

Puppy Love: ♡ | ☆ | *

Your hybrid, Jimin, hates baths but he certainly doesn’t hate it when you help him and give him lots of attention and cuddles. He loves it all - especially you.

|| Series ||

None yet

Kim Taehyung

|| One Shots ||

A Very UnMerry Christmas: ♡ | ♧

Your husband likes to cling onto his childhood and innocence but your daughter shatters it all. He isn’t truly upset, he knows the truth deep down, but he sure wishes your daughter wouldn’t grow up so fast. Good thing you got them a present that makes everything better.

Fairytale: ♡ | ☆

There are stories which tell of a mystical being who protects and heals the sacred forests and it’s creatures within; many don’t believe because that’s all they are - stories. But it’s all far too real when you become a part of the fairytale.

|| Series ||

None yet

Jeon Jungkook

|| One Shots ||

What I See: ♡ | *

Jungkook finds many things beautiful and likes to take pictures of them; one of his favorite subjects happens to be you, and he wants to capture every single moment, but you don’t think you’re as beautiful as the other things he snaps pictures of - he’ll just have to show you how beautiful you truly are.

|| Series ||

Lost and Found Masterlist: ♥ | ♡ | ☆ | * | ✎

Running away and getting lost in the mountainous forest was a mistake, but you meet a wolf that is like no other, who helps you and you instantly grow attached - maybe it wasn’t a mistake and it was actually fate.

i love dancing
space and 
writing

body:
Intellects

Male reader x Namjoon

Turned out more gender neutral than anything

The rain quietend significatntly as you entered the quiet book shop, immediatly you were taken over by a sense of calm. You took your time, exploring the rows upon rows of books untill you found the right one that caught your eye. Only to find it was tragically out of reach. You glanced around to see if anyone was watching before attempting to reach patheticly, before a deep chuckle was heard behind you and you spun around quickly.

A tall and attractive man stood behind you, his black hood failing to hide his pink hair.

“Hang on” he mumbles and reaches for the book “Farenheight 451 huh?”, He hands the book to you “thats a pretty deep book”

“I know, I’ve read it” you stuttered and blushed violently, his eyebrows raised slight surprise.

“Most people would like to burn it after reading it” he chuckled, handing the book to you

You shrugged “I take pride in being one of the rare people that enjoys it” and head off to the counter.

“Wait” he grabbed your wrist gently, “since as you say, you’re such a rare peroson, i was wondering if i could get your number? And then we could talk about intellect stuff” he trailed off awkwardly

“Sure, intellect stuff” you scoffed before holding out your hand “I’m Y/n”

“Namjoon” he accepted your handshake, “ I err don’t have any paper or my phone” he scratched the back of his neck awkwardly

You took his hand and scribbled your number messily before heading towards the counter again “see you around Intellect”

jimin, writing poetry in a notebook angrily: Love is dead and never existed. All you did was betray me as I lay sick and festering. You are the definition of dread.

namjoon: what happened?

jimin: jungkook stole my fucking garlic bread

summary: (BTS sweets party in Harajuku: full trans) JK chooses a question card. Q. The one thing you like about Jimin-san [member next to...
body:
(BTS sweets party in Harajuku: full trans) JK chooses a question card.

Q. The one thing you like about Jimin-san [member next to you]

JK: His cheekiness/boldness

JM: (laughs) Am I bold?

RM: What kind of [bold] face does he make?

JM: I wasn’t aware that I was bold…

JK: [to the others] like the face he’s making now.

Jin: Yeah that’s true

JK: Lately he’s been especially bold/cheeky (gestures between himself and JM)

JM: Ah, isn’t that why you like it? Since I’m bolder more now?

JK: …….. (nervous silence)

JH: That’s it? That’s all?

JK: (nervous)….ah…he’s pretty nice to me…(begins fiddling with his drink) (T/N: He says ‘be nice to me’ in Korean but the Japanese subs wrote it as above)

JH/RM: What? That’s sudden O.o

TH: Then which member is not nice to you?

JK: (flustered) ah no…all members are nice to me…hya~~~ <3 

(T/N: lmao baby bun is not as smooth as he thought xDDD)

Link: https://twitter.com/NKYK7710/status/1004770282366644225
